title: General
text: No credit shall be allowed under subsection (a) for any taxable year if——the lesser of——the modified adjusted gross income of the taxpayer for such taxable year, or—the modified adjusted gross income of the taxpayer for the preceding taxable year, exceeds—the threshold amount.
conditions: ——the lesser of——the modified adjusted gross income of the taxpayer for such taxable year, or—the modified adjusted gross income of the taxpayer for the preceding taxable year, exceeds—the threshold amount.

if: ——the lesser of——the modified adjusted gross income of the taxpayer for such taxable year, or—the modified adjusted gross income of the taxpayer for the preceding taxable year, exceeds—the threshold amount.
logical_structure.result: No credit shall be allowed under subsection (a) for any taxable year

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 25E(b)(1)In General—No credit shall be allowed under subsection (a) for any
                     taxable year if—I.R.C. § 25E(b)(1)(A)—the lesser of—I.R.C. § 25E(b)(1)(A)(i)—the modified adjusted gross income of
                           the taxpayer for such taxable year, orI.R.C. § 25E(b)(1)(A)(ii)—the modified adjusted gross income of
                           the taxpayer for the preceding taxable year, exceedsI.R.C. § 25E(b)(1)(B)—the threshold amount.

title: Amount
text: For purposes of paragraph (1)(B), the threshold amount shall be——in the case of a joint return or a surviving spouse (as defined insection 2(a)), $150,000,—in the case of a head of household (as defined insection 2(b)), $112,500, and—in the case of a taxpayer not described in subparagraph (A) or (B), $75,000.

logical_structure.result: For purposes of paragraph (1)(B), the threshold amount shall be——in the case of a joint return or a surviving spouse (as defined insection 2(a)), $150,000,—in the case of a head of household (as defined insection 2(b)), $112,500, and—in the case of a taxpayer not described in subparagraph (A) or (B), $75,000.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 25E(b)(2)Threshold Amount—For purposes of paragraph (1)(B), the threshold amount
                     shall be—I.R.C. § 25E(b)(2)(A)—in the case of a joint return or
                        a surviving spouse (as defined insection
                           2(a)), $150,000,I.R.C. § 25E(b)(2)(B)—in the case of a head of household
                        (as defined insection 2(b)),
                        $112,500, andI.R.C. § 25E(b)(2)(C)—in the case of a taxpayer not described
                        in subparagraph (A) or (B), $75,000.

title: Adjusted Gross Income
text: For purposes of this subsection, the term “modified adjusted gross income” means adjusted gross income increased by any amount excluded from gross income undersection 911,931, or933.

logical_structure.result: For purposes of this subsection, the term “modified adjusted gross income” means adjusted gross income increased by any amount excluded from gross income undersection 911,931, or933.

                     adjusted gross income” means adjusted gross income increased
                     by any amount excluded from gross income undersection 911,931,
                     or933.

requirements: adjusted gross income increased by any amount excluded from gross income undersection 911,931, or933.

title: Clean Vehicle
text: The term “previously-owned clean vehicle” means, with respect to a taxpayer, a motor vehicle——the model year of which is at least 2 years earlier than the calendar year in which the taxpayer acquires such vehicle,—the original use of which commences with a person other than the taxpayer,—which is acquired by the taxpayer in a qualified sale, and—which——meets the requirements of subparagraphs (C), (D), (E), (F), and (H) (except for clause (iv) thereof) ofsection 30D(d)(1), or—is a motor vehicle which——satisfies the requirements under subparagraphs (A) and (B) ofsection 30B(b)(3), and—has a gross vehicle weight rating of less than 14,000 pounds.

except: for clause (iv) thereof) ofsection 30D(d)(1), or—is a motor vehicle which——satisfies the requirements under subparagraphs (A) and (B) ofsection 30B(b)(3), and—has a gross vehicle weight rating of less than 14,000 pounds.

title: Sale
text: The term “qualified sale” means a sale of a motor vehicle——by a dealer (as defined insection 30D(g)(8)),—for a sale price which does not exceed $25,000, and—which is the first transfer since the date of the enactment of this section to a qualified buyer other than the person with whom the original use of such vehicle commenced.

logical_structure.result: The term “qualified sale” means a sale of a motor vehicle——by a dealer (as defined insection 30D(g)(8)),—for a sale price which does not exceed $25,000, and—which is the first transfer since the date of the enactment of this section to a qualified buyer other than the person with whom the original use of such vehicle commenced.

title: Buyer
text: The term “qualified buyer” means, with respect to a sale of a motor vehicle, a taxpayer——who is an individual,—who purchases such vehicle for use and not for resale,—with respect to whom no deduction is allowable with respect to another taxpayer undersection 151, and—who has not been allowed a credit under this section for any sale during the 3-year period ending on the date of the sale of such vehicle.

logical_structure.result: The term “qualified buyer” means, with respect to a sale of a motor vehicle, a taxpayer——who is an individual,—who purchases such vehicle for use and not for resale,—with respect to whom no deduction is allowable with respect to another taxpayer undersection 151, and—who has not been allowed a credit under this section for any sale during the 3-year period ending on the date of the sale of such vehicle.

title: Vehicle; Capacity
text: The terms “motor vehicle” and “capacity” have the meaning given such terms in paragraphs (2) and (4) ofsection 30D(d), respectively.

logical_structure.result: The terms “motor vehicle” and “capacity” have the meaning given such terms in paragraphs (2) and (4) ofsection 30D(d), respectively.

title: Number Requirement
text: No credit shall be allowed under subsection (a) with respect to any vehicle unless the taxpayer includes the vehicle identification number of such vehicle on the return of tax for the taxable year.
conditions: the taxpayer includes the vehicle identification number of such vehicle on the return of tax for the taxable year.

logical_structure.result: No credit shall be allowed under subsection (a) with respect to any vehicle

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 25E(d)VIN Number Requirement—No credit shall be allowed under subsection (a) with
                  respect to any vehicle unless the taxpayer includes the vehicle identification
                  number of such vehicle on the return of tax for the taxable year.

title: Of Certain Rules
text: For purposes of this section, rules similar to the rules ofsection 30D(f)(without regard to paragraph (10) or (11) thereof) shall apply for purposes of this section.

logical_structure.result: For purposes of this section, rules similar to the rules ofsection 30D(f)(without regard to paragraph (10) or (11) thereof) shall apply for purposes of this section.

I.R.C. § 25E(e)Application Of Certain Rules—For purposes of this section, rules

                  regard to paragraph (10) or (11) thereof) shall apply for purposes
                  of this section.

title: Of Credit
text: Rules similar to the rules ofsection 30D(g)shall apply.

raw_text: I.R.C. § 25E(f)Transfer Of Credit—Rules similar to the rules ofsection 30D(g)shall apply.

text: No credit shall be allowed under this section with respect to any vehicle acquired after September 30, 2025.

I.R.C. § 25E(g)Termination—No credit shall be allowed under this section with respect to any vehicle acquired
